review: got this for my birthday & I love it!!!! totally worth it & I have not been disappointed at all! definitely recommend for college students because the stick is easy to take anywhere!
author: Heidi Muery

review: This is a wonderful device. Easy to set up and use. The only downside that I have had is that it is hard to read the titles being displayed. Print is very small and when highlighted it dos't enlarge. Other then that it has been a great addition to my entertainment choices.
author: Ernest D. Bliss

review: It was much more than I expected.  Really out performs the Google Chrome.
author: Tom McGrath Jr

review: All I was looking for was some way to maybe get some sporting games even if I had to pay for them, most tv shows I get with my Antenna they want to charge me 2 to 3 $ for. If your looking for movies its not to bad of a deal but still cost ya.
author: Michael

review: Really like it. Thinking of buying another one for another tv
author: Virginia Gifford

review: One of the best items we ever purchased!
author: beverly plante

review: Love fire stick. Great series and prime movies. Now will be able to take this on vacation,watching movies on TV rather than a laptop.
author: Amtrak51
